comments:
3.1M3 first build
- observed on aix and solaris, probably happens everywhere

- run eclipse with the example plugins
- Window -> Preferences
- show the Team - Pessimistic Filesystem Provider preference page
- press OK to dismiss the preferences dialog, will get the following exception:

Hm, there is no ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException but the combo boxes are empty on
that page. They should display the current settings. Is this a result of the fix?

No, that was the cause of the error in the first place. I added the code that 
addressed the error but didn't fix the underlying cause. I didn't want to 
spend that mush time on it, since it was not all that important to the 
pessimistic provider example.
Verified that no Exception is thrown for 3.1M4.
